sentences.sContent: ...the largest gypsy community of any country.
sentences.sCn: …所有国家中最大的吉卜赛人社区。

synos.tran: 吉卜赛人；吉卜赛语；像吉布赛的人；歌舞剧中的歌舞队员

trans.tranCn: 吉卜赛人；吉卜赛语；像吉布赛的人；歌舞剧中的歌舞队员
trans.tranOther: a member of a group of people originally from India, who traditionally live and travel around in  caravans  , and who now live all over the world. Most gypsies prefer to be called  romanies  .

trans.tranCn: 象吉卜赛人的；吉卜赛人的；无照的
